name: WomenWithEpilepsyDiagnosticGrouping
title: Women with Epilepsy (Diagnostic Grouping)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains ICD9CM & ICD10CM concepts for epilepsy),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify people diagnosed with epilepsy that might benefit from counseling regarding anti-seizure medication and risks of pregnancy. This element may map to "Diagnosis" Category of the Quality Data Model.),(Inclusion Criteria: ),(Exclusion Criteria: )
